text: Mettmann is a town in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. It is the capital of the district of the same name. Mettmann is known for the Neanderthal. == Twin towns == Mettmann is twinned with: * Laval, France (1974) === Friendly cities === Mettmann also has friendly relations with: * Markranstädt, Germany (1990) * Żnin, Poland (1997) * Goražde, Bosnia and Herzegovina (1998) == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the city of Mettmann Category:Mettmann Rural District
title: Mettmann
